long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Reforesty is an extension that will allow you to contribute to reforestation projects for free while you shop online. Install the extension in your browser and when you visit an affiliated ecommerce shop it will open an overlay. If you click on the button, a percentage of 2-3% of your purchase in that shop will be donated to reforestation projects. Reforesty is completely free for users, since donation is made by the ecommerce shop.
